text: Rajavarothiam Sampanthan (; ; 5 February 1933 â€“ 30 June 2024) is a Sri Lankan Tamil politician and lawyer. He has been the Tamil National Alliance party leader since 2001. He has also been a Member of Parliament since 2001. He was the Leader of the Opposition from September 2015 to December 2018. He passed at a private hospital on 30 June 2024, at the age of 91.Former TNA Leader R. Sampanthan no more ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Sri Lankan politicians
title: R. Sampanthan
